31256788-71fb-4003-a9ca-9e6164a8faa3.title: SMAR Driver (Gen 8)
31256788-71fb-4003-a9ca-9e6164a8faa3.description: The brain of the race car. Connects to the SMAR Engine and steering bearings. Handles perception, decision making, and actions. Must be placed on a lift to initialize car dimensions correctly.

74bfdcd7-cfb2-4791-9611-602154eb90dd.title: SMAR Engine (Gen 8)
74bfdcd7-cfb2-4791-9611-602154eb90dd.description: The heart of the car. Connects to the Driver and wheel bearings. Simulates RPM, torque, and gears. Features custom audio and tuning support.

5d8f2445-31bb-4079-94ab-dc1df1e6e3ed.title: SMAR Track Scanner
5d8f2445-31bb-4079-94ab-dc1df1e6e3ed.description: Generates racing lines. Place at the start/finish line facing the track direction. Interact to scan or toggle visibility. Use the hammer to edit nodes manually.

9f5ce20a-b774-4df9-9b6a-d1993c705138.title: SMAR Track Loader
9f5ce20a-b774-4df9-9b6a-d1993c705138.description: Saves and loads track data. Place near the start line to save the generated track to the world or blueprint. Essential for persisting track layouts.

ab524867-122b-4f98-990b-67ff6d2e9c5c.title: SMAR Downforce Unit
ab524867-122b-4f98-990b-67ff6d2e9c5c.description: Applies aerodynamic downforce to the vehicle. Adjust force by interacting ('E' to increase, Crouch+'E' to decrease). Improves cornering grip.

011818d5-aead-49d8-aca6-50a33cb88e96.title: SMAR Race Control
011818d5-aead-49d8-aca6-50a33cb88e96.description: Manages the race state (Practice, Qualifying, Race). Connect logic inputs to start/stop. Interacting opens the race settings menu.

e80d963c-3af2-47aa-99d8-365e1569a568.title: SMAR Checkpoint
e80d963c-3af2-47aa-99d8-365e1569a568.description: Defines track segments and splits. Place sequentially around the track after scanning. Auto-connects splines. Shoot to clear nodes.

04caa519-f127-4235-a792-7a83a79afd21.title: SMAR Camera
04caa519-f127-4235-a792-7a83a79afd21.description: Static trackside camera. Used for broadcasting angles. Requires external scripts for full functionality.

b20d3826-3235-459c-a4c9-ef1438caaed9.title: Brake Light Controller
b20d3826-3235-459c-a4c9-ef1438caaed9.description: Visual feedback for braking. Connect the Driver to this, and this to the brake lights. Lights up when the AI applies brakes.

bd16db06-b593-443f-8680-94b01842d067.title: SMAR Pit Point
bd16db06-b593-443f-8680-94b01842d067.description: Defines the pit lane path. Use specific colors to designate the path type (entry, lane, exit).

f3105b84-0577-4d34-93b3-10fa62531f5c.title: SMAR Pit Box
f3105b84-0577-4d34-93b3-10fa62531f5c.description: Designates the stopping area for pit stops. Place in the pit lane where cars should service. Resizable.
